About Me

BIO

Over 16 years of experience in talent development. Proficient in leadership and management training, instructional design, assessments and e-learning. Reporting to the executive team on training operations on a weekly and monthly basis. Completed MA in English Language and Literature Teaching from Ateneo De Manila University, certified in TESOL and Lean Six Sigma Black Belt (IASSC).

Senior Learning Manager

TeleDeveleopment Global Services

Currently working as a Senior Learning Manager with experience in supporting mid to large sized global organizations with their training needs in the field of Shared Services, Telco, Finance, Shipping, Logistics & Transformation. Strong understanding of people development, and a capacity to build partnerships across business units & organizations to drive HR transformation, change and a learning culture.
